description: A hwMgmdGlobalLimit notification signifies that an IGMP report has been limited for
up to maximum entries of IGMP global routing-table.
This notification is generated whenever an IGMP report failed to create membership
as IGMP global routing-table limit.

event.Summary: IGMP membership failed due to global limit reached

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGlobalLimit HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdSource a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGroup a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGlobalEntries u 9999

description: Source address of the entry.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdSource

description: Group address of the entry.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGroup

description: The total number of IGMP or MLD entries of this instance.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGlobalEntries

description: A hwMgmdInterfaceLimit notification signifies that an IGMP report has been limited for
up to maximum entries of IGMP interface routing-table.
This notification is generated whenever an IGMP report failed to create membership
as IGMP interface routing-table limit.

event.Summary: IGMP membership failed due to interface limit reached

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdInterfaceLimit HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdSource a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGroup a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdLimitInterfaceIfIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdInterfaceEntries u 9999

description: Source address of the entry.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdSource

description: Group address of the entry.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGroup

description: The interface from which an IGMP or a MLD limit trap is
most recently sent. If this router has not sent a limit
trap, this object is set to 0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdLimitInterfaceIfIndex

description: The total number of IGMP or MLD entries on the interface.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdInterfaceEntries

description: A hwMgmdTotalLimit notification signifies that an IGMP report has been limited for
up to maximum entries of IGMP total routing-table.
This notification is generated whenever an IGMP report failed to create membership
as IGMP total routing-table limit.

event.Summary: IGMP membership failed due to total limit reached

description: The total number of IGMP or MLD entries of all instances.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdTotalEntries

description: A hwMgmdGmpJoin notification signifies the IGMP or MLD join message was received.

event.Summary: IGMP or MLD join message received on interface

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpJoin HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpInterfaceName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpInterfaceIfIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpJoinVersion u 1 HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpJoinSrcAddr s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpJoinGrpAddr s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpJoinSenderIp s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdInstanceName s EXAMPLE

description: The interface name of the interface for which IGMP or MLD
is enabled.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpInterfaceName

description: The ifIndex value of the interface for which IGMP or MLD
is enabled. The table is indexed by the ifIndex value and
the InetAddressType to allow for interfaces which may be
configured in both IPv4 and IPv6 modes.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpInterfaceIfIndex

description: The version of MGMD which is running on this interface.
Value 1 applies to IGMPv1 and MLDv1 version. Value 2 applies
to IGMPv2 and MLDv2 version, and value 3 applies to IGMPv3
version.
This object can be used to configure a router capable of
running either version. For IGMP and MLD to function
correctly, all routers on a LAN must be configured to run
the same version on that LAN. This object MAY be
modified under any rowstatus condition.
???? DEFVAL { 2 }
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpJoinVersion

description: The IGMP or MLD source address to join.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpJoinSrcAddr

description: The IGMP or MLD group address to join.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdGmpJoinGrpAddr

description: The host IP address for sending membership report.

description: The instance name of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdInstanceName

description: A hwMgmdGmpLeave notification signifies the IGMP or MLD group leaved.

event.Summary: IGMP or MLD group leaved

variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdNotificationAddressType

description: The current number of IGMP or MLD proxy (S, G) entries of all instances.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostSGCurrentCount

description: The threshold value of IGMP or MLD proxy (S, G)entries uppper limit(%) of all instances.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostSGThreshold

description: The total number of IGMP or MLD proxy (S, G) entries of all instances.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostSGTotalCount

description: A hwMgmdHostSGExceed notification signifies that IGMP or MLD proxy (S, G) entries can not be created because the limit of all instances is reached.

event.Summary: IGMP or MLD proxy (S, G) entries count limit reached

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostSGExceed HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdNotificationAddressType i 0 HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostNotificationSrcAddr s EXAM HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostNotificationGrpAddr s EXAM HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostSGTotalCount u 9999 HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdInstanceName s EXAMPLE

description: The address type of the multicast group address in the most
recently sent IGMP or MLD limit trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdNotificationAddressType

description: The source address in the most recently sent IGMP or MLD proxy limit trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostNotificationSrcAddr

description: The multicast group address in the most recently sent IGMP or MLD proxy limit trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostNotificationGrpAddr

description: The total number of IGMP or MLD proxy (S, G) entries of all instances.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostSGTotalCount

description: The instance name of the trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdInstanceName

description: A hwMgmdHostSGExceedClear notification signifies that IGMP or MLD proxy (S, G) entries can be created because can be created because the number of IGMP or MLD (S, G) entries of all instances fell below the limit.

event.Summary: IGMP or MLD proxy (S, G) entries count restored

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostSGExceedClear HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdNotificationAddressType i 0 HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostSGTotalCount u 9999

description: The address type of the multicast group address in the most
recently sent IGMP or MLD limit trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdNotificationAddressType

description: The total number of IGMP or MLD proxy (S, G) entries of all instances.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MGMD-STD-MIB::hwMgmdHostSGTotalCount
